instances.code:
import asyncio

current_user = None

async def process():
    await asyncio.sleep(0.1)
    print(f"Processing for {current_user}")

async def handle_request(user):
    global current_user
    current_user = user
    await process()

async def main():
    await asyncio.gather(
        handle_request("Alice"),
        handle_request("Bob")
    )

asyncio.run(main())

import asyncio

async def log_request(user):
    print(f"Request by {user}")

async def handle_request(user):
    await log_request(user)

async def main():
    await asyncio.gather(
        handle_request("Alice"),
        handle_request("Bob")
    )

asyncio.run(main())

import asyncio

state = {}

async def task(id):
    state["id"] = id
    await asyncio.sleep(0.1)
    print(state["id"])  # Race condition

async def main():
    await asyncio.gather(task(1), task(2))

asyncio.run(main())

x = 10
y = 20
z = x + y
print(z)

import threading

local = threading.local()
local.user = "Alice"
print(local.user)
